reuze

Class ib_FilterLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterWholeImage
        • reuze.ib_FilterLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ib_FilterChrome

    public class ib_FilterLight
extends ib_a_FilterWholeImage
    A filter which produces lighting and embossing effects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
